Title: Small TFS client
Description: <SmallTFS> is a simple, standalone client for <Team Foundation Server> 2010. Supports basic functionalities (CheckIn, CheckOut and rewies of checked out files. The project is writtenin <WPF> .NET <C#> V 4.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SmallTFS is a simple, standalone client for Team foundation Server 2010. Supports basic functionalities (CheckIn, CheckOut and rewies of checked out files. The project is writtenin WPF .NET C# V 4.0.
This project is a staring point for a usefull rich tfs standalone TFS client.

The project is ment to be a base for more TFs operations like task management or merging and braching. 

Everibody are invited to contribute and help me create a usable standalone TFs client that can be usefull for all who don't have Visual studio installed.
